name: TypeScript/JavaScript Standards
description: Enforces TypeScript and JavaScript coding standards. Based on language-standards.md
author: Promptcraft

rules.message: Avoid the 'any' type completely. Use proper TypeScript types.
Prefer standard function declarations over arrow functions for named functions
Use optional chaining (?.) and nullish coalescing (??) operators appropriately
Interfaces should use PascalCase and start with capital letter
Imports must be at the top of the file
